subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Fearing they would miss it, the St. Louis men’s basketball players stopped at a New Jersey store to watch the N.C.A.A. tournament selection on their way to the airport.
snippet: Fearing they would miss it, the St. Louis men’s basketball players stopped at a New Jersey store to watch the N.C.A.A. tournament selection on their way to the airport.
